evidence.claim: Shlama Home Health Care complies with HIPAA regulations to ensure patient privacy and security.
The company utilizes FHIR standards to facilitate electronic health information exchange.
Job postings indicate a focus on engineering roles that require knowledge in cloud services, hinting at integration with cloud platforms.
Their website mentions adherence to EDI protocols for medical billing transactions.

icp.icp_reason: No relevant evidence found regarding X12 transactions or clearinghouse for this company.
